## Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

- [ ] I have read and followed the [theme creation guidelines](../_theme_creation_guidelines.md)
- [ ] My theme is publicly hosted and accessible without CORS restrictions
- [ ] The `theme_config.json` file is properly formatted and all fields are filled
- [ ] My theme is hosted on a public GitHub repository
- [ ] I have tested the theme and it works correctly
- [ ] The theme URL points directly to the CSS file
- [ ] My theme follows accessibility best practices (readable contrast ratios)
- [ ] I have added my theme to `themes_list.json` correctly as a key-value pair within the main JSON object (not as a separate object)
- [ ] The `themes_list.json` file is valid JSON after my changes
